page.title: 20A Saturday.
page.content: On Saturdays I wake up and look through the window and look at the weather and then I go downstairs.Iwash my face and brush my teeth and then I eat my breakfast and if it is a nice day I go out to play.If it is raining I play inside or I go to the library and read books there.Sometimes I go to my cousin's house and play there. I go to the park and sometimes I go shopping with my Mum.We sometimes shop on Foleshill Rd. I like going to the Co-op and V.Sports and Jib's the best.When I go to the Co-op I skid around on the slippy floor. I wheel the trolley for my Mum. By Jasreen,Broad Heath Primary School,Coventry.
